url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/The Void

sections.body: This black card spells instant disaster. The character's body continues to function, as though comatose, but her psyche is trapped in a prison somewhere—in an object on a far plane or planet, possibly in the possession of an outsider. A wish or a miracle does not bring the character back, instead merely revealing the plane of entrapment. Draw no more cards.

name: The Void
